mapper.select: select no from project where project_name=#{projectName }

select gh.no, gh.event_type as eventType, gh.user_name as userName, gh.message, gh.date, gh.project_no as projectNo, pj.project_name as projectName, task.crew_no as crewNo, crew.master_crew_user_no as masterCrewUserNo from githubhook as gh, project as pj, task, crew where gh.project_no = pj.no and pj.no = task.project_no and task.crew_no = crew.no order by gh.no desc limit 1;
